statements: SELECT * FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT user_id, course_id FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM user_activity WHERE course_id = 102;
SELECT MAX(activity_timestamp) AS latest_activity_timestamp FROM user_activity;
SELECT user_id, course_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 10 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE course_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY user_id ASC, activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY activity_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT course_id FROM user_activity WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM activity_timestamp) = 9 ORDER BY course_id ASC;
SELECT activity_type, COUNT(*) AS type_count FROM user_activity GROUP BY activity_type HAVING type_count > 10 ORDER BY type_count DESC, activity_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM course_info WHERE category = 'Programming';
SELECT user_id, activity_date, duration_minutes FROM user_activity WHERE course_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Quiz' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, duration_minutes FROM user_activity WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT course_name, instructor, category FROM course_info WHERE level = 'Intermediate'
SELECT user_id, activity_date, course_name, instructor, duration_minutes FROM user_activity JOIN course_info ON user_activity.course_id = course_info.course_id
SELECT user_id, SUM(duration_minutes) AS total_duration FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id
SELECT user_id, MAX(duration_minutes) AS max_duration FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Quiz'
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email, age FROM users WHERE age >= 25;
SELECT course_name, instructor, duration_hours FROM courses ORDER BY duration_hours DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type='completed' AND user_id=1;
SELECT course_id, course_name, category FROM courses WHERE category='Programming' AND duration_hours < 10;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, category FROM courses WHERE duration_hours > 10 ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT u.username, c.course_name, ua.activity_type, ua.timestamp FROM users u, courses c, user_activity ua WHERE u.user_id = ua.user_id AND c.course_id = ua.course_id;
SELECT COUNT(course_id) AS total_courses, AVG(duration_hours) AS avg_duration FROM courses WHERE category = 'Programming';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT course_name, creator_id FROM courses ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT course_name, total_views FROM popular_courses WHERE total_views > 100 ORDER BY total_views DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT course_id, course_name, creator_id FROM courses ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, creator_id, created_at FROM courses WHERE creator_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT course_id, course_name, total_views FROM popular_courses WHERE total_views > 1000 ORDER BY total_views DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT course_name, instructor, rating FROM courses ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT activity_type, activity_date FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND activity_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT course_id, views, likes, dislikes FROM popular_courses WHERE likes > dislikes AND views > 1000 ORDER BY likes DESC, views ASC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT course_name, instructor, rating FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe' ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT u.username, c.course_name, ua.activity_type FROM users u JOIN user_activity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id JOIN courses c ON c.course_id = ua.course_id WHERE ua.activity_type = 'completed' ORDER BY ua.activity_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT pc.course_id, pc.views, pc.likes, pc.dislikes, c.course_name FROM popular_courses pc JOIN courses c ON pc.course_id = c.course_id ORDER BY pc.views DESC LIMIT 5;
